channel.title: Wearing Items
channel.description: So pretty simple, i'm trying to create a portal that takes you to a minigame. BUT, in order to use it, you need to have no items in your invintory or on you. I've already made it so you can't have anything in your invintory, but if anyone knows what the code would look like to basically say "if the player is wearing no items" i would be very thankful :P

item.title: Wearing Items
item.dc:creator: @Carnifex12 Carnifex12
item.description:
@Carnifex12 wrote:

So pretty simple, i’m trying to create a portal that takes you to a minigame. BUT, in order to use it, you need to have no items in your invintory or on you. I’ve already made it so you can’t have anything in your invintory, but if anyone knows what the code would look like to basically say “if the player is wearing no items” i would be very thankful
